AcceuilData.paragraph: I am a web developer, and I am here to present myself in my professional portfolio. I hope you will enjoy the work I have created.

about1: Passionate about innovation and everything related to generating new knowledge. I face problems with a smile and solve them as soon as possible. I am very mindful of the time I spend and the work I accomplish.
about2: Web developer with over 1 year of experience . Proficient with the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies . Expertise in Angular, JavaScript, Node.js, and user interface (UI) design with responsive designs . Good understanding of Bootstrap, MongoDB, and MySQL . Additionally, I can also work on test automation using Selenium with the TestNG framework.

experienceData.work: Technologies: Angular, Node JS, MySQL . Worked on the web application built with Angular for various activities and campaigns . This application aims to facilitate repetitive tasks for the company.

Technologies: Selenium, TestNG, Robot . This project aimed to manage mining services . Tested applications to find bugs and developed an automation test program using Selenium.

projectData.title: Price Comparison
projectData.desc: The 'Price Comparison' project is a web application designed to help users compare prices of different products from various online retailers. Developed using Angular and Spring Boot, this application provides a user-friendly interface that allows users to search for a specific product and instantly get prices from multiple online sources. The Angular framework enables creating a responsive and dynamic user interface, ensuring a smooth user experience. The intuitive user interface allows users to enter the desired product and easily browse through the results. The application fetches real-time data from various online retailers, ensuring that users receive the most up-to-date pricing information.

projectData.title: Spring MVC CRUD
projectData.desc: The 'springMVC-crud' project is a comprehensive web application developed using the Spring MVC framework. It offers robust CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality to manage data in a user-friendly way. Built on the powerful Java ecosystem, this project leverages the architecture of Spring MVC to provide a scalable and maintainable solution for your web application needs. CRUD Operations: Easily perform create, read, update, and delete operations on your data. The application provides a smooth user interface to efficiently manage records.

projectData.title: Leave and Training Management System
projectData.desc: We are proud to present our revolutionary Leave and Training Management System, a comprehensive software solution designed to transform how organizations manage their human resources. Our cutting-edge system integrates efficient modules for employee leave, personnel data, accounts, training, and training assignment. Leveraging Angular, Express.js, Node.js, and MySQL technologies, our solution offers seamless performance and empowers HR departments to optimize their operations.
